function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to chemicals such as nitric acid and pure GOPTS","Impact":"Chemical exposure can lead to skin and respiratory irritation, and long-term health effects.","Mitigation":"Use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), work in a well-ventilated area, and follow safety guidelines for handling chemicals.","Technologies":"Fume hoods, protective gloves, safety goggles, and respirators","People":"Workers, researchers, and anyone involved in the preparation of the films","Owner":"Laboratory supervisors, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Contamination risk from unattached polymer chains during film fabrication","Impact":"Presence of unattached polymer chains can lead to contamination of the environment and potentially cause health hazards if inhaled or ingested.","Mitigation":"Implement thorough rinsing and drying processes to remove unattached polymer chains, and use appropriate waste disposal methods.","Technologies":"DI water rinsing, nitrogen gas drying, and waste disposal protocols","People":"Workers, researchers, and anyone involved in the film fabrication process","Owner":"Laboratory supervisors, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Risk of exposure to Cu2O particles during film fabrication and testing","Impact":"Exposure to Cu2O particles can lead to respiratory irritation, skin allergies, and long-term health effects if proper precautions are not taken.","Mitigation":"Use personal protective equipment (PPE), work in a controlled environment, and follow safety guidelines for handling and testing Cu2O films.","Technologies":"Fume hoods, protective gloves, safety goggles, and respirators","People":"Workers, researchers, and anyone involved in the fabrication and testing of Cu2O films","Owner":"Laboratory supervisors, health and safety officers"}]}
